prompt_base: photograph of a beautiful young alien woman, light mint green skin tone, short spiky white hair, large luminous purple eyes, wearing a tight futuristic galactic patrol suit, determined expression
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, cinematic studio lighting, hyperdetailed skin texture, subtle subsurface scattering on skin, high gloss texture on the suit, sharp focus on eyes and armor seams
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, bright green skin, flat lighting, low quality, helmet effect, deformed eyes, unnatural eyes
